dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

RE:COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
DOSLIFE Co. (herein referred to as Owner) and the DOSLIFE website
(www.doslife.org):

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3)),
we
are instructed to place you on notice that:

1. The Owner is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to
DOSLIFE Co., the doslife.org website and the text, artwork, logos
and photographs appearing therein (DOSLIFE Material); and

2. Utilizing the search query, "doslife," at www.yahoo.com, the
following search results and sponsored links (the "Infringing
Material") contain unauthorized copies of DOSLIFE Material or
unauthorized derivative works of the DOSLIFE Material which
infringe upon DOSLIFE and the exclusive rights of the Owner:

The offending site is here:
http://www.retrocomputing.net/info/doslife/
This includes but is not limited to any and all pages listed under
(subpages) of the offending URL/site.

Whois Record for Retrocomputing.net
alberto@a2sistemi.it
Registry Data
ICANN Registrar: EASYSPACE LTD
Created: 28-Mar-2000
Expires: 28-Mar-2008
Registrar Status: REGISTRAR-LOCK
Whois Server: whois.easyspace.com
Name Server: DNS.A2SISTEMI.IT

Easyspace.com - info@easyspace.com
Alberto Rubinelli - alberto@a2sistemi.it

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the Infringing
Material.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the Infringing Material
is not authorized by the DOSLIFE, its agents or the law. The
information in this Notice of Copyright Infringement is accurate
and under penalty of perjury I am the Owner.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter,
please contact me at the email address indicated below:

Sincerely, DOSLIFE Admin
www.doslife.org (previously www.doslife.com)

Ronald Hayes, Owner & Sole Proprietor - DBA, DOSLIFE Co.
Washington State UBI # 602 098 062
425-350-4209
doslife@hush.ai
or
convict129@hotmail.com
